level.text: The Commission may, for good cause, waive any rule under chapter 27 except where a rule contains a provision that is expressly required by statute.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 48 DCR 4664, 4670 (May 25, 2001); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR10016 (October 29, 2004); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 9020, 9041 (October 21, 2011).
